mission.success: Mission completed. You made this many points:
mission.error: Sorry, mission could not be saved:

update.fail: Sorry, your profile couldn't be updated.

resetPassword.invalidToken: Your password reset token has expired. Please request a new token.
resetPassword.success: Password reset successful. You can now log in.

register.title: Register
register.description: To edit anything on Veganaut.net, please register.

form.name: Name of the location
form.selectCoordinates: Choose a point on the map or use the search field

placeholder.description: Short description of this location, e.g. type of offer and opening hours.

products.title: Vegan Offer
products.description: This location offers these vegan options:

noProducts.anonymous: No options have been entered yet. If you register you can enter vegan options available here.
noProducts.user: No options have been entered yet. You can enter vegan options by completing one of the missions below.

explanation.teamPoints: The team with this colour has this many points here

quality.explanation: The more twigs the bigger and better the vegan offer here

effort.explanation: The fairer the whether the better the chances that the vegan offer will improve if more veganauts come here

visitBonus.title: Visit this location.
visitBonus.explanation: For your first visit at a location within a few weeks you get points.
visitBonus.description: Only complete this mission if you are currently visiting this location.

hasOptions.title: Ask the staff for vegan options.
hasOptions.description: According to the staff, are there any vegan options available here?
hasOptions.description2: What do you think: are there any vegan options available here?
hasOptions.explanation: Explicitly ask for something vegan, or ask whether something is vegan, using the word "vegan". By doing so you can make sure that the staff realises: "Our customers are interested in vegan options, there's a demand." This improves the chances that they'll supply more and better vegan options in future.

outcome.yes: You said that according to the staff there are vegan options here.
outcome.no: You said that according to the staff there are no vegan options here.
outcome.ratherYes: The staff doesn't know but you think that they probably have vegan options here.
outcome.noClue: The staff doesn't know and you also have no idea whether they have any vegan options here.
outcome.ratherNo: The staff doesn't know but you think that they probably don't have any vegan options here.

wantVegan.title: Talk to the staff about vegan options.
wantVegan.description: What expressions did you or the staff use while talking about vegan options?
wantVegan.explanation: Sometimes the staff doesn't know what "vegan" means, or you are unsure whether they know. Sometimes they think they know, but they seem to confuse it with something else, or they forget that e.g. butter isn't vegan. At other times, the staff explains how their vegan options are produced, or what they contain.

outcome.description: You talked to the staff about vegan options and the following expressions were used:

particularOption.title: Ask for a specific vegan product.
particularOption.description: Which specific vegan product did you ask for?
particularOption.explanation: Ask the staff for one or several specific vegan products that you are interested in. If they don't sell them yet they might do so in the future, given enough people ask for them.

form.placeholder: Enter the product which you asked for

outcome.description: You asked for these vegan products:

newOption.title: Ask whether there are any new vegan products on offer.
newOption.description: According to the staff, are there any new vegan products on offer?
newOption.explanation: Ask the staff whether they recently introduced any new vegan products.

outcome.description: Newly available according to the staff:
outcome.descriptionNothing: According to the staff, there aren't any new vegan products available here.

whatOptions.title: Find out what vegan options are available here.
whatOptions.description: What vegan options are available here?
whatOptions.description2: You don't have to re-enter the following options:
whatOptions.explanation: The goal is to make the list of vegan options as complete and as up-to-date as possible. Add vegan options that aren't on the list yet, confirm vegan options that are already listed and indicate which vegan options on the list are not available (at the moment).

buyOptions.title: Buy something vegan.
buyOptions.explanation: Do you fancy one or the other vegan option available here? If so, you can show the staff that it pays off to supply vegan options by buying. And while you're paying, why not mention that you chose this option (in part) because it's vegan? The more the staff hears the word "vegan" in a positive context, the better.

giveFeedback.title: Mission: Impossible.
giveFeedback.description: What kind of impossible mission did you attempt here?
giveFeedback.explanation: Sometimes it's the most improbable things that work the best. According to legend, a sinlge veganaut got the space gunk dispenser near launch pad XQR-9 to offer vegan Haute Cuisine by just telling the staff: "Why don't you guys switch to a 100% vegan menu? Here's a 5160 year old cookbook and an antique camping stove that I found on the surface, feel free to use them!"

outcome.description: You tried this mission impossible here:

rateOptions.title: Rate the vegan options available here.
rateOptions.description: How do you rate these vegan option?
rateOptions.explanation: There's no accounting for taste, but chances are that if you like something other people will like it too. Conversely, if something doesn't convince you then it's quite possible that other people won't fancy it either. But never mind other people's opinion here. Just provide the ratings that are right for you personally.

offerQuality.title: Evaluate this location from a veganautic standpoint.
offerQuality.description: How well does this location satisfy veganautic needs?
offerQuality.explanation: Veganauts want to be able to choose from a lot of high-quality vegan options. At some places there are no or hardly any vegan options, or the vegan options aren't convincing yet. At other places there already are a few vegan options, some of which are satisfying. Yet other places have a quite remarkable range of vegan options, many of which are great. Finally, there are places where there are tons of vegan options and they are all fantastic.

effortValue.title: Make a veganautic weather forecast for this location.
effortValue.description: Is the vegan offer likely to grow and prosper at this location?
effortValue.explanation: In some locations the staff has zero interest in anything "vegan", in other places they are more open or have already taken one or two steps in the vegan direction and are only wating for their customers to ask for more.

outcome.yes: The weather for the vegan offer looks good here.
outcome.ratherYes: The weather for the vegan offer looks rather good here.
outcome.ratherNo: The weather for the vegan offer looks rather bad here.
outcome.no: The weather for the vegan offer looks bad here.

form.title: Search for locations on the map
